about:
I am Adeel Ahmad, a final-year Computer Science student at UET Lahore.

I having recently completed my sixth semester. My skill set includes C++, C#, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, ReactJS, MS SQL, and Node.js, and I hold a certificate in MERN stack development from KICS Centre, UET Lahore. As a freelancer, I have gained extensive experience in website development, desktop development, Python web scraping, and Shopify store creation. I am eager to learn new skills and passionate about embracing emerging technologies.
